REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0242 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-DEF 04-13 0084

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET DEFICIT FORECAST AT 400 MLN STG
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it forecast a shortage of around 400 mln stg in the money market today. Among the main factors affecting liquidity, bills maturing in official hands and the take-up of treasury bills will drain some 1.085 billion stg. Partly offsetting these outflows, a fall in note circulation will add some 340 mln stg, exchequer transactions around 300 mln and bankers' balances above target about 50 mln. REUTER
